useCase.name: Edit Job Opening Details
useCase.description: User can edit the details of a job opening.

preconditions.precondition: User is authenticated and has permission to edit job openings.

mainSequence.step: Select option to edit a job opening.
Request input for a job reference.
Show job opening details and ask if user wants to update the description.
Ask if user wants to update address.
Ask if user wants to update the Mode.
Ask if user wants to update the Contract Type.
Ask if user wants to update the job title.
Ask if user wants to update the number of vacancies.
Request user for new values to update.
Display updated job opening and show operation success.
